1.title: Tita empieza una nueva vida en la ciudad
1.plot: Tita promises to her son Rey he will become a great soccer star some day. Waldo leaves his family because of his debt and Tita must go to the capital to protect her children.

2.title: Tita le prohíbe a Waldo estar cerca de sus hijos
2.plot: Waldo finds Tita in the city and asks her forgiveness for having left without word. Tita no longer believes his lies and prohibits him from seeing their children.

3.title: Rey descubre que Waldo le es infiel a Tita
3.plot: Tita secures a job thanks to the Colonel's recommendation. Rey sees Waldo kissing Martina and runs away without saying anything. Tita worries when she can't figure out where Rey has gone.

4.title: Tita y Waldo se encuentran con 'La Bomba' Rodríguez
4.plot: Rey's trainer sexually harasses Tita in exchange for giving her son a chance. Tita and Waldo see each other again when they meet Rey's idol 'La Bomba' Rodríguez.

5.title: Tita es detenida por la policía
5.plot: Martina and Waldo try to sell their stolen jewelry, but are interrupted by the police. Martina accuses Tita of being Waldo's accomplice and she is arrested. Tita makes a proposal to 'La Bomba' Rodríguez.

6.title: 'La Bomba' Rodríguez es el nuevo entrenador de Rey
6.plot: Tita succeeds in getting 'La Bomba' Rodríguez to accept to train Rey in return for helping him to quit drinking. Martina tells Fabiola that her father is a thief on the run from the police.

7.title: Tita renuncia a su trabajo
7.plot: Fabiola wants to leave to find her father, but 'La Bomba' convinces her to stay home. After a discussion with Nadia, Tita quits her job and plans to return to working on the cruise.

8.title: Rey da sus primeros pasos como futbolista profesional
8.plot: Daniel feels as though he has a family again after a long time. With Tita's help, Daniel beats his addiction to alcohol and together they form a football team together to advance Rey's career as a professional player.

9.title: Daniel le pide a Tita que vivan juntos
9.plot: Rey and Fabi agree that his mother should have a relationship with Daniel, but everything gets complicated when he chooses his career as a technical director over the woman he loves.

10.title: Daniel siente celos de Delfino
10.plot: Delfino arrives in the city to meet up with Tita, but he is disappointed to learn she is in a relationship with 'La Bomba'. Meanwhile, Daniel gets jealous of Delfino.

11.title: Rey es seleccionado para entrar a los Búfalos
11.plot: After receiving threats, Tita decides to live with Daniel. Rey is selected by the Búfalos and refuses to lose his opportunity to begin his career as a professional football player.

12.title: ¡Tita y Daniel se comprometen!
12.plot: Tita discovers Dante's true intentions and refuses to sign Rey's first contract. Daniel gives Tita a ring with the promise that he will one day propose to and marry her.

13.title: Fabi y Matías deciden casarse
13.plot: Rey believes he is not valued by the Buffalos and decides to move to Costa Hermosa with Tita and Daniel and play for a different team. Matías insists that he loves Fabi and plans to marry her as soon as possible.

14.title: Tita firma el contracto de Rey con los Búfalos
14.plot: Tita receives as new offer from the Buffalos and signs Rey's first contract with the team. Rey declares his love for Frida and she accepts to be his girlfriend. Daniel says goodbye Tita in order to achieve his dream.

15.title: Rey se escapa a una fiesta con los Búfalos
15.plot: Thanks to Tita, Rey gets to know the players on the Buffalos team - including his idol Nelson. When Nelson invites Rey to a party at his house, Rey accepts without telling anyone where he is going.

16.title: Valeria y Rey pasan la noche juntos
16.plot: Rey spends the night with Valeria and loses his virginity to her. After finding out Rey is with another girl, Frida ends their relationship.

17.title: Tita le da una lección a Rey
17.plot: Problems continue between Tita and Rey, especially when she finds out he skipped school to spend time with Valeria. Tita threatens to refuse to let Rey debut as a player for the Buffalos.

18.title: Tita y Daniel hacen una promesa de amor
18.plot: Daniel and Tita decide to separate for a short time to ensure their relationship doesn't get in the way of Rey's studies. Secretly both Daniel and Tita want to get married and form a family together.

19.title: Daniel pide la mano a Tita
19.plot: Matías asks Fabi if she wants to marry him and Daniel asks Pedro for Tita's hand in marriage. Delfino and Martina set a trap for Chino so the police can discover his dirty business practices.

20.title: Salomé atropella a Tita
20.plot: Delfino tries to kiss Tita, but Daniel arrives to stop it. After an argument, Daniel and Tita break off their engagement. Salomé and her lover run over Tita with their car.

21.title: Tita está secuestrada
21.plot: When Tita is kidnapping by Salomé, Daniel desperately looks for her after receiving a call demanding money. Rey signs with Dante to get the ransom money.

22.title: ¡La vida de Rey corre peligro!
22.plot: Daniel is fired as Technical Director and decides to stay by Tita's side. Rey is attacked because of Quique and he suffers serious injuries that put his life at risk.

23.title: Matías admite que no está enamorado de Fabi
23.plot: Frida learns Salomé has turned to prostitution. Fabi's wedding day arrives, but it could be canceled because of the unexpected return of Rene - Matías's true love.

24.title: ¡Tita sorprende a Frida y Rey en la cama!
24.plot: Gonzo finds out his father paid off the judges to get him a spot with The Buffalos. Frida and Rey give in to passion, but they are very nearly caught in bed by Tita.

25.title: Frida podría estar embarazada
25.plot: Frida is afraid she may be pregnant after having unprotected sex with Rey. Tita discovers Quique is on the run from the police.

26.title: Rey es convocado a la selección
26.plot: Rey is selected along with Quique and Gonzo to play at Sub 17, but he needs Tita and Waldo's permission before he can travel to Europe and make his dream come true.

27.title: ¡Frida y Rey van a tener un hijo!
27.plot: Frida's pregnancy test is positive, but she decides to leave Rey so he will not have to sacrifice his dream for a baby. Tita is at the point of finding Waldo with Daniel's help.

28.title: Tita se entera que Rey va a ser papá
28.plot: Fabi confronts Matías for having married her without loving her. Before leaving on his trip for Europe, Rey tells Tita that Frida is pregnant with his child.

29.title: Salomé corre a todos de la pensión
29.plot: Devastated, Fabi decides to end her marriage to Matías. Salomé is furious that Rey got Frida pregnant and kicks everyone out of her boarding house as revenge.

30.title: Tita es la nueva dueña de la pensión
30.plot: The pension is evicted just like Salomé demanded, but now that Rey has become a professional footballer and has enough money - Tita returns to take back the pension.

31.title: Rey consigue ser futbolista profesional
31.plot: Rey earns the 10 jersey as a professional footballer with the Buffalos. To pay tribute to Tita and Daniel for everything they have done for him, Rey puts the name "Bomba Menchaca" on his uniform.

32.title: Valeria y Rey se reencuentran
32.plot: Tita organizes a game to help Sergio in which Rey suffers a grave injury that could put his professional career at risk. Already devastated, Rey is further shocked when he re-encounters Valeria.

33.title: Matías acepta que es homosexual
33.plot: With Tita in his corner, Matías finally confesses to his mother that he is gay. Frida supports Rey in his decision to travel to Europe, even though she knows Valeria will be going with him.

34.title: Rey tiene una nueva esperanza para seguir jugando
34.plot: Rey decides not to go to Europe with Valeria to avoid causing problems with Nadia. Rey's operation is successful and everyone helps him concentrate on rehabilitation.

35.title: Tita y Beba son arrestadas
35.plot: Tita and Beba are arrested for trafficking in counterfeit money and cell phone theft. Froylán remembers that he had security cameras installed and finds proof to demonstrate innocence.

36.title: Salomé finge estar enferma
36.plot: Salomé pretends to have a terminal illness to keep Froylán by her side and force him to forget about Beba.

37.title: Frida pierde a su bebé
37.plot: Frida suffers a miscarriage and Rey attempts to help her heal after their monumental loss.

38.title: Valeria quita a Frida del camino
38.plot: Valeria takes advantage of Frida's miscarriage since Rey is now single without a pregnant girlfriend to tie him down.

39.title: Rey juega con los Chapulines y llegan a la final
39.plot: Rey joins the team led by Daniel and, in short time, he becomes their best goal scorer. Thanks to Rey's effort, the Grasshoppers make it to the finals and face off against the Buffalos.

40.title: Daniel y Dante recuperan su amistad
40.plot: Thanks to Julián, Daniel finds out about the cowardly act Arsenio committed to ruin his football career. Dante apologizes to 'La Bomba' and promises to clear his name.

41.title: Rey cumple su promesa y le regala un depa a Tita
41.plot: Rey receives his first payment as a professional footballer and surprises Tita by gifting her a luxurious apartment. Nadia does not suspect that her new neighbors are Rey and his family.

42.title: Nelson le roba fama a Rey
42.plot: Nelson stains Rey's reputation as a footballer to rob him of the opportunity to star in a toothpaste commercial.

43.title: Daniel y los Chapulines ganan la Copa Latinoamerica
43.plot: Tita travels with Daniel to support him while he coaches the Grasshoppers. The 'La Bomba's efforts pay off and the team wins the Latin American Cup.

44.title: Quique y Fabi ya son novios
44.plot: Quique takes a risk on his fate with Fabi and asks her to give him a chance. She agrees and they share their first kiss.

45.title: Waldo arruina la boda de Tita y Daniel
45.plot: In the middle of the religious ceremony at Tita and Daniel's wedding, Waldo appears and ruins the most important moment. Tita runs away from the church and takes refuge at José Antonio's apartment.

46.title: Daniel cree que Tita se acostó con José Antonio
46.plot: After getting drunk, Tita falls asleep in José Antonio's bed. When Tita arrives at her apartment in men's clothing, Daniel mistakenly believes she slept with their neighbor.

47.title: Ángela se acerca de nuevamente de Daniel
47.plot: After finding out Tita left him at the altar, Ángela offers Daniel her support and her unconditional love.

48.title: Tita y Rey son los nuevos socios de Nadia
48.plot: Emiliano takes the company presidency from Nadia and incorporates Tita into the advertising agency.

49.title: Rey se entera que Waldo tiene otra familia
49.plot: Rey and Fabi discover that Waldo has another wife and two children. With this new information, they beg Waldo to stay away from Tita and to let her be happy with Daniel.

50.title: Tita inicia una nueva etapa como empresaria
50.plot: Tita changes her look and begins a new chapter as an associate at the advertising agency. To start off on the right foot, she proposes that Daniel should be the face of their new publicity campaign.

51.title: Waldo y Nadia hacen equipo para acabar con Tita
51.plot: Waldo takes charge of blackmailing Crisóforo and, in exchange, Nadia agrees to team up with him to get rid of Tita and Rey.

52.title: José Antonio le declara su amor a Tita
52.plot: José Antonio breaks up with Maika and confesses to Tita that he is in love with her. Waldo signs the divorce papers with the sole intention of getting more money.

53.title: Daniel termina con Tita y se refugia con Ángela
53.plot: Daniel decides to break up with Tita after falling for Waldo's lies. Tita does not want to let him go and tries to fix things between them, but Daniel surprises everyone by proposing to Ángela.

54.title: Ángela y Daniel se casan
54.plot: Ángela takes advantage of the fact that Daniel is single and convinces him to marry her. Gonzo and Dante serve as witnesses at the wedding, and Tita is left heartbroken because the love of her life is already with another woman.

55.title: Frida sigue enamorada de Rey
55.plot: Frida steals a kiss from Rey to thank him for paying for Salomé's medical treatment. Rey is happy to know that Frida is still in love with him.

56.title: Rey gana el campeonato y se corona como máximo goleador
56.plot: The Buffalos defeat the Coconut Trees to win the championship. With 13 goals scored, Rey is named MVP and dedicates his triumph to Tita.

57.title: Joel y Nelson le pone una trampa a Quique
57.plot: Joel and Nelson plan a party in hopes of getting Quique to fall into temptation and betray Fabi.

58.title: Nelson acusa a Rey de ser un drogadicto
58.plot: Nelson tries to ruin Rey's reputation by dismissing him as a drug addict and a harmful influence on Valeria's health. The club finds out about Nelson's party and sanctions the players.

59.title: Don Pedro muere
59.plot: Waldo shoves Pedro, causing him to fall and suffer irreparable head injuries. After arriving at the hospital, Tita bursts out crying at news her father has died.

60.title: Rey llega a España
60.plot: Rey arrives in Spain to meet his new team, and they don't receive him very well at first. He assures them he will prove that he was born to be a champion.

61.title: Frida y Rey vuelven a ser novios
61.plot: Froylan surprises Frida with a trip to Spain so that she can visit Rey. Frida and Rey rekindle the love between them and enjoy quality time together in Madrid.

62.title: Waldo y Nadia van a la cárcel
62.plot: With Quique's help, Celso confesses that Nadia and Waldo participated in robbing the agency. Tita is shocked to discover that Waldo murdered her father. Meanwhile, Nelson's football career ends for good.

63.title: Capítulo Final: Tita se convierte en la jefa del campeón
63.plot: Rey achieves his dreams of playing in the World Cup for Mexico, making Tita proud to be the manager of a champion.

imdb.title: La jefa del Campeón
plot: A spirited, humble woman named Tita vows to do everything she can to make her son Rey's dream of becoming a professional soccer player come true.::skillwithaquill
